title: Need answer please
body:
First i  would like to thank you for your skills in improving the game

Second i was have out of range when i do game full screen and want know it will fix  fastly or will get long time for fix because my  Fps is low and thx

replies.body:
Hey Sniper-bro, thanks for giving us the shout out!

That out of range problem is probably being caused by League trying to run at a higher resolution than is possible on your current monitor settings. Try switching your in-game resolution settings to something a bit lower, or try hitting alt+enter to run the game in windowed mode instead of fullscreen.
Thank u bro for your answer and i hope you all success all time
